div.div: THERE'S GOOD NEWS AND GOOD NEWS

div.a: What It's Like To Be A Reporter In China

div.div: My first day of work in Beijing, my boss asked if I knew the "Three Ts." The Three Ts, he informed me, were the three most taboo topics to avoid in Chinese media -- Taiwan, Tibet, and Tiananmen.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S1sUtn&via=Digg&text=What It's Like To Be A Reporter In China

div.a: This Is How Thieves Will Snatch Your Phone On The Train

div.div: You already know that smartphone theft is becoming super common. This is exactly how it happens.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SKMonc&via=Digg&text=This Is How Thieves Will Snatch Your Phone On The Train

div.a: Microsoft-Apple Redux: The Empire Strikes Back

div.div: It used to be that Microsoft was the evil empire, and Apple the scrappy underdog. Now the roles are reversed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S45nZa&via=Digg&text=Microsoft-Apple Redux: The Empire Strikes Back

div.a: Why Are Mean People So Good Looking?

div.div: People who are bad know how to make themselves look good.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNomfL&via=Digg&text=Why Are Mean People So Good Looking?

div.a: NASA's Time-Lapse Video Of Hurricane Sandy Is Terrifying, Beautiful

div.div: The footage confirms a few things that we already know: hurricanes are terrifying, beautiful and will likely leave you without power for days, forcing you to contemplate reading a book.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TKkLzb&via=Digg&text=NASA's Time-Lapse Video Of Hurricane Sandy Is Terrifying, Beautiful

div.a: The Enduring Fallacy Of Astrology And Why Your Sign Actually Isn't Your Sign

div.div: Astrology remains a thriving industry with a daily column in virtually every major newspaper on the planet. Why?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S3UZR5&via=Digg&text=The Enduring Fallacy Of Astrology And Why Your Sign Actually Isn't Your Sign

div.div: Remember the iPod? It just observed its 11th birthday Tuesday, though few noticed. Since the iPhone has been cannibalizing iPod sales, why is Apple still trying?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S3gjq3&via=Digg&text=Why Apple Cannibalized The iPod

div.a: Google Cancels Android Event Due To Hurricane Sandy

div.div: The cancellation of Monday's event doesn't mark the first time that Google has adjusted its product announcement plans based on current events.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U56tnj&via=Digg&text=Google Cancels Android Event Due To Hurricane Sandy

div.a: 10 Things You Should Never Flush Down Your Toilet

div.div: Wet wipes are wreaking havoc, but they are not the strangest things to have been found in our sewers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SE5Ul1&via=Digg&text=10 Things You Should Never Flush Down Your Toilet

div.div: Italy-based artist Diego Fazio, better known as DiegoKoi, is bound to blow you away with his incredible drawing skills.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pwbeuq&via=Digg&text=This Is A Drawing

div.div: LOOSE CANDY CORNS EQUAL TO PENNIES

div.a: The Definitive Guide To Trading Halloween Candy

div.div: Smarties for a full-size Snickers? You got it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y531NE&via=Digg&text=The Definitive Guide To Trading Halloween Candy

div.a: Let Your Smartphone Deliver The Bad News

div.div: Texting and instant messaging make it easier to navigate our social lives, but they are also turning us into ill-mannered flakes.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TIsUUy&via=Digg&text=Let Your Smartphone Deliver The Bad News

div.a: What's The Secret To Learning A Second Language?

div.div: Studies reveal it's more than just a matter of memory. A look at what the science of recall can teach us.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PxSYkf&via=Digg&text=What's The Secret To Learning A Second Language?

div.a: What You Need To Know About Hurricane Sandy To Get Ready

div.div: Sandys swirling circulation and high winds will reach from Ohio and the Great Lakes region all the way to the New England Coast and down into the Carolinas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P9pEPz&via=Digg&text=What You Need To Know About Hurricane Sandy To Get Ready

div.div: STEVE JOBS DIDN'T BELIEVE IN PHILANTHROPY

div.a: Why Do Apple Employees Donate Less Than Google And Microsoft Workers?

div.div: Why are Apple employees so stingy, compared to their techie competitors?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNmPpR&via=Digg&text=Why Do Apple Employees Donate Less Than Google And Microsoft Workers?

div.a: Millions Of SSNs Lifted From South Carolina Database

div.div: If you live in South Carolina, there's a very good chance that slipshod state government security has allowed an overseas computer criminal to acquire your Social Security number.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P9xxEE&via=Digg&text=Millions Of SSNs Lifted From South Carolina Database

div.a: Is It Possible To Have Three Genetic Parents?

div.div: In the end, whether three-parent children are permitted will probably depend on the public uggh! factor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UHqHJ3&via=Digg&text=Is It Possible To Have Three Genetic Parents?

div.a: Why You Should Be Terrified Of Hurricane Sandy

div.div: Hurricane Sandy is a big deal. Weather experts are 90 percent certain that it will strike the East Coast, gaining in strength and size as it comes ashore.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RlXdxC&via=Digg&text=Why You Should Be Terrified Of Hurricane Sandy

div.a: Former Executioners Share Their Misgivings About Death Penalty

div.div: Ron McAndrew, a former prison warden, said he began to have doubts about the death penalty after seeing flames dance from the head of an inmate strapped into Florida's electric chair.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RUG7Fa&via=Digg&text=Former Executioners Share Their Misgivings About Death Penalty

div.a: What Number Is Halfway Between 1 And 9? Is It 5 Or 3?

div.div: Ask adults from the industrialized world what number is halfway between 1 and 9, and most will say 5. But pose the same question to small children, or people living in some traditional societies, and they're likely to answer 3. How can we explain this?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QVPhDx&via=Digg&text=What Number Is Halfway Between 1 And 9? Is It 5 Or 3?

div.a: Felix Baumgartner Sounds Off On NASA, Sir Richard Branson

div.div: The Austrian daredevil, who travelled to the edge of space before jumping back to Earth, has branded Nasa's aim to discover whether there is life on Mars a waste of money.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SfqlaO&via=Digg&text=Felix Baumgartner Sounds Off On NASA, Sir Richard Branson

div.div: As you may have heard, Clark Kent just quit his job at the Daily Planet in DC's Superman comics to become a blogger.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R6LuQa&via=Digg&text=Superman Makes Poor Life Decisions

div.div: HE'S GONE SOFT IN HIS OLD AGE

div.a: Castro's Nuclear EpiphanyAnd What It Reveals About The Minds Of Dictators

div.div: Did the Cuban leader's change of heart on nuking the United States come from a realization about his own death?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4tS8h&via=Digg&text=Castro's Nuclear EpiphanyAnd What It Reveals About The Minds Of Dictators

div.a: Last Night's Jeopardy Contestants Sure Did Not Know Much About Video Games

div.div: On Friday's "Jeopardy," the Final Jeopardy written question was: "The villains in this game were inspired by the swine flu epidemic scare." The three contestants' guesses were not close to the actual right answer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PWjgww&via=Digg&text=Last Night's Jeopardy Contestants Sure Did Not Know Much About Video Games

div.a: 99 Facts About Beer On the Wall...

div.div: No one knows who penned the song 99 Bottles of Beer, but its saved the sanity of many a parent and camp counselor stuck with unruly kids on long road trips. Here's a tribute to the masterpiece.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QJV25n&via=Digg&text=99 Facts About Beer On the Wall...

div.div: ROBOT NAVY MEANT FOR 'SPYING, NOT ATTACK'

div.a: Watch A Robotic Navy Boat Shoot Missiles For The First Time Ever

div.div: Killer robots have officially gone out to sea. For the first time, the Navy has fired missiles from a remote-controlled boat.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S1VpHQ&via=Digg&text=Watch A Robotic Navy Boat Shoot Missiles For The First Time Ever

div.div: DON'T GO AS HONEY BOO BOO

So much of a good costume is more about the cleverness of its idea, its humor, than its craft. Here are ten costumes that you can put together in an evening (or less) that should generate a splash at your party this weekend or on Halloween night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SbHged&via=Digg&text=10 Last Minute Costumes That DontSuck
